scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only firestore
scripts.test: npm run test_mocked; npm run test_emulated
scripts.test_emulated: export FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST='localhost:8080' && mocha -r ts-node/register 'test/*.emulated.ts' --reporter spec; unset FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST
scripts.test_system: export FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST='localhost:8080' && mocha -r ts-node/register 'test/*.systemtest.ts' --reporter spec; unset FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST
